Synopsis: Retrieves BIOS information from a remote or local computer.
Description: This function retrieves BIOS information from a specified computer using CIM/WMI.

Examples.Title: EXAMPLE 1
Examples.Code:
Get-ComputerBios -ComputerName "RemoteComputer" -Protocol Wsman
Retrieves BIOS information from a remote computer using the Wsman protocol.

Examples.Title: EXAMPLE 2
Examples.Code:
Get-ComputerBios -All
Retrieves all available BIOS information from the local computer.
